title: Sampler, 2003-14-27, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: cross stitch embroidery, withdrawn and deflected element work, satin and stem stitch embroidery
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Silk in blues, greens, yellows and pale oranges on white cotton. Composed in two sections: on the left, only half completed, geometric pattern bands with deflected element work. On the right, cross stitch floral bands, a cross stitch band with mice, alphabets and numerals, satin stitch floral and vine patterns.
